# Tool Deflection

> **Skill ID:** `prism-physics-tool-deflection`
> **Category:** PHYSICS
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Calculate tool bending under cutting forces

## Capabilities

- Calculate tool deflection

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in tool deflection.

### When to Use

- When working with physics
- When needing tool deflection capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-tool-geometry`
- `prism-physics-force-kienzle`

## Hooks

- `deflection:tool-deflection:calculate`
